review: I love it we can take it anywhere we go in are trailer
author: martha

review: Absolutely "LOVE" Fire TV.  Hands down much better than ChromeCast or even the Amazon FireStick.Only two minor things I don't like..1.) Inability to cast to it as I can do with ChromeCast2.) Really wish they included the Rdio app.  That is my preferred streaming music provider.
author: TECHYONE

review: This has helped get around a lot.  And it is a good device, easy to use
author: Tim Simmons

review: Easy to use.  Must have a good internet connection.
